website_summaries.verdict: An all-season pool cover for above ground pools that guards against the elements.
pros: Available in 9 different dimensions to suit most rectangular above-ground pools
cons: Cable and winch are not as durable as the cover itself, and may need replacement in time

customer_reviews.title: I installed this on my pool this year. Some ...
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on my pool this year. Some of the grommets have already pulled off the cover. I have a feeling the pool is going to be a mess when we take it off. I don’t think this one is very well made, even for the $100 price. I wouldn’t buy it again. Next time I will also get a bigger one to allow for overhang.
customer_reviews.author: ShinedownAddict

customer_reviews.title: Got 4 yrs out of this cover, going to buy again and see how it does
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cover in 2016, it's lasted through 4 winters before it started to leak water through. I'm going to buy again. The price has dropped since then and hopefully the quality hasn't dropped too. Edit... its now unable to be shipped to my address so I'm not able to buy it again this year and see if its still any good.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan E.

customer_reviews.title: Thin material.
customer_reviews.text: Must be thin because water from the pool comes through and evaporates. I lost 18 inches of water throughout the winter months. This was also due to the water being drained off the top after it would rain. Thought I had a leak in the pool but the liner was fine after I filled it up.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Chiaramonte

customer_reviews.title: super heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: super heavy duty, oversize cover should outlast the cheaper black ones I have been buying. This is very heavy cover and well made, worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: missing parts
customer_reviews.text: This product did not come with the cable and winch as advertised. Only received cover - very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: momof3

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: Great working with this company came fast and all descriptions were accurate. We put it on but now we will see how it holds up this winter. Thnaks
customer_reviews.author: Cathalah

customer_reviews.title: I got 3 years out of it!
customer_reviews.text: I got 3 years out of it! I just now realized it was this cover! But I may buy it again just to know that I can get 3 years out of it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Michael Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Nice pool cover.
customer_reviews.text: Got the pool cover quickly and it fits nice. Seems like it will be a good cover but have not had it long. We will see how it survives the cold winter her in Ohio.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Longstreth

customer_reviews.title: Short comings
customer_reviews.text: Product is not the dimensions it lists. It barely has 2’ of overhang. We will see how it holds up through the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Jon G. OConnor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice heavy duty material and the over hang is more then enough, highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Daniel McLernon

customer_reviews.title: Blue Pool Cover
customer_reviews.text: Great Heavy Duty cover, fit perfect. Better than what we got from our local pool company over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavyweight
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, looks like I may get a few years out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Enroughty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Large enough to fit with overhang to ensure it's secure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Blue Wave BWC926 Gold 15-Year 16-ft x 28-ft Oval Above Ground Pool Winter Cover,Royal Blue
product_meta.description: The Dirt Defender Gold grade cover is constructed of our strongest and most tear resistant material. This cover features rugged U.V. stabilized woven polyethylene that protects it from sun, snow, wind and ice. It features a black underside to retard algae growth and heat sealed seams to ensure a crystal clear pool next spring. The cover features a big 4 foot overlap that means it will fit above ground pools with wider top rails unlike smaller 3 foot overlap covers. This Dirt Defender Gold grade cover is held secure by a heavy duty cable and winch tightener that is anchored to the cover by rip proof metal grommets. This rugged cover is built to last, backed by a 15 year warranty (3 years full rated). Invest in quality this fall with Dirt Defender Gold. This Dirt Defender cover comes in royal blue with a black underside.
feature_bullets: Pool Size: 16 ft. x 28 ft. Oval
Cover Size: 20 ft. x 32 ft. Oval
4 foot overlap to fit most top rails
Heavy Duty Cable and Winch Tightener Included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars22 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
